note.p: Teacher. Daughter of the Rev. Richard and Fanny Hibbs. Married Richard George Holland in Hampstead in 1863; widowed in 1871. Living in Ramsgate, Kent, and principal of a school with her sister, 1891, 1901.
Census returns of England and Wales 1891 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG12/731/54/9), 1901 (RG13/826/49/21)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 August 2019)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 August 2019)
